overview: Some men say cocksucking isn't really sex. I'd have to agree: it's more than "just sex." It's a way of life, a means of communion and communication. Whether it's in a room filled with a dozen buddies or in front of a gloryhole, sucking cock is life at its best. Sure, for some it's a warm-up for fucking. But for many men--myself included--cocksucking is why we were born.
title: Suck Dick Save The World
